select distinct a.class_code ,a.cpno ,a.id ,b.subject_name ,a.class_rank ,a.class_name ,a.start_date ,a.end_date ,a.cpcheck from class a, subject b, subdetail c where a.cpcheck = '3'
and a.end_date>=sysdate
and a.subdetail_code=c.subdetail_code and c.subject_code=b.subject_code

select a.class_code ,a.id ,b.subject_name ,a.class_rank ,a.class_name ,a.start_date ,a.end_date ,a.cpcheck from class a, subject b, subdetail c where a.cpcheck != '3'
and a.end_date>=sysdate
and a.id=#{id} and a.subdetail_code=c.subdetail_code and c.subject_code=b.subject_code
order by a.start_date

select distinct a.class_code ,f.name ,a.total_time ,d.subject_name ,a.class_rank ,a.class_name ,a.start_date ,a.end_date ,a.cpcheck ,a.id from class a, time_detail b, classroom c, subject d, subdetail e, member f where a.class_code=b.class_code and b.room_code=c.room_code and a.id=f.id and a.subdetail_code=e.subdetail_code and e.subject_code=d.subject_code
and a.class_code=#{class_code}
select a.cphead,a.textbook,a.cpno from class_plan a, class b where a.cpno=b.cpno and b.class_code=#{class_code}
select a.class_code ,a.start_time ,a.end_time ,a.classday ,b.room_no from time_detail a, classroom b where class_code=#{class_code} and a.room_code=b.room_code order by a.classday
select c.wpno, c.week, c.content, c.cpno from class_plan a, class b, weekplan c where a.cpno=b.cpno and b.cpno=c.cpno and b.class_code=#{class_code} order by c.week
select c.homeworkplan, c.no, c.content, c.cpno from class_plan a, class b, homeworkplan c where a.cpno=b.cpno and b.cpno=c.cpno and b.class_code=#{class_code} order by c.no
select classplan_seq.nextval from dual
mapper.update: insert into class_plan (cpno, subject_code, cphead, textbook) values (#{cpno},#{subject_code},#{cphead},#{textbook})
mapper.select: select classplan_seq.nextval from dual
mapper.update: insert into weekplan (wpno, cpno, week, content) values (#{wpno},#{cpno},#{week},#{content})
mapper.select: select classplan_seq.nextval from dual
mapper.update: insert into homeworkplan (homeworkplan, cpno, content, no) values (#{homeworkplan},#{cpno},#{content},#{no})

select class_code,cpno,class_name,start_date, end_date from class where id=#{id} and cpcheck='3'
and end_date>=sysdate

select a.class_name,c.week,c.content,a.start_date,a.end_date,d.subject_name from class a, class_plan b, weekplan c, subject d, subdetail e where a.cpno=b.cpno and b.cpno=c.cpno and e.subject_code=d.subject_code and a.subdetail_code=e.subdetail_code and c.cpno=#{cpno} order by c.week asc
select class_code,class_name, end_date from class where id=#{id} order by end_date desc
select a.review_code,b.class_name,a.star_score,a.title, a.content from class_review a, class b where a.class_code=b.class_code and b.id=#{id}
select a.coun_code, a.con_start, a.con_end, a.title, b.name from counselt a, member b where counselor=#{counselor} and a.client=b.id and to_char(meetdate,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD')
select a.title, a.end_date, b.class_name from assign a, class b where b.id=#{id} and a.class_code=b.class_code and to_char(a.end_date,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD')
select a.exam_name, a.start_date, a.end_date from exam a, class b where a.class_code = b.class_code and to_char(a.start_date,'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') and b.id=#{id}
